class motornet.plants.muscles.ReluMuscle(**kwargs)#

Bases: motornet.plants.muscles.Muscle

A rectified linear muscle that outputs the input directly, but can only have a positive activation value.

class motornet.plants.plants.ReluPointMass24(timestep=0.01, **kwargs)#

Bases: motornet.plants.plants.Plant

class motornet.plants.plants.RigidTendonArm26(muscle_type, skeleton=None, timestep=0.01, **kwargs)#

Bases: motornet.plants.plants.Plant

This pre-built plant class is an implementation of a “lumped-muscle” model from Kistemaker et al. (2010), J. Neurophysiol. Because lumped-muscle models are functional approximations of biological reality, this class’ geometry does not rely on the default geometry methods, but on its own, custom-made geometry.
